messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a sales company. Amir is the CEO of the company and has two senior managers under him: Wim and Raj. Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Raj has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books.  From Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas

To get the maximum number of books, I need to find the path that leads to the person with the highest number of books. In this case, I will start with Amir, the CEO of the company. Since Amir does not have any salespersons reporting to him, I need to check the two senior managers, Wim and Raj. 

Checking Wim, I find that he has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. So, the total number of books from Wim and his salespersons is 78 (56 + 22).

Checking Raj, I find that he has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. So, the total number of books from Raj and his salespersons is 60 (10 + 50).

Comparing the totals, I can see that the maximum number of books comes from Wim and his salespersons. Therefore, to get the maximum number of books, I should meet with the following people in order: Amir, Wim, Jing, and Wei.

Answer: Amir, Wim, Jing, Wei

This time you meet Amir and he tells you about his secretary Kim. Kim is dating Jing. When you meet with Amir and choose the path that led to the maximum number of books previously, you discover that the path is now blocked. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of books. Starting from Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas..

To find the new path that leads to the maximum number of books, I will start with Amir, the CEO of the company. Since the previous path is now blocked, I need to reassess the options.

Since Kim, Amir's secretary, is dating Jing, one of Wim's salespersons, it is likely that Jing's path is also blocked. Therefore, I will focus on Raj's path.

Checking Raj, I find that he has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. So, the total number of books from Raj and his salespersons is 60 (10 + 50).

Comparing this total with the previous maximum of 78 books, it is clear that Raj's path provides a lower number of books.

Therefore, to get the maximum number of books with the new circumstances, I should meet with the following people in order: Amir and Wim.

Answer: Amir, Wim
